amendment.description: To ensure that the aggregate amount made available for transportation projects for a fiscal year does not exceed the estimated amount available for those projects in the Highway Trust Fund for the fiscal year.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1810 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1810 proposed by Senator Corker. (consideration: CR S1533-1534; text: CR S1534) To ensure that the aggregate amount made available for transportation projects for a fiscal year does not exceed the estimated amount available for those projects in the Highway Trust Fund for the fiscal year.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1810 proposed by Senator Corker.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1810 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
